roleset.name: having big plans for great success
roleset.note: AMBITIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from ambitious.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: No running . It might be ambitious given the time . It 's two miles from your place

example.name: both args
example.text: ...he was ambitious about using his knowledge, experience and high-status to help his homeland Ethiopia...
example.arg: about using his knowledge, experience and high-status to help his homeland Ethiopia
